front.title: Offer & Answer interworking between JSEP & SIP

abstract.t: Real time communcation Web (RTCWeb) workgroup defines the real time commmunication using JavaScript Session establishment protocol (JSEP) as an offer/answer mechanism. Session Initiation protocol (SIP) is IETF defined and well deployed protocol for real time communication. This document provides offer & answer interworking between JSEP and SIP.
